definition[0]: approval or agreement from someone who has authority
example[1]: the assent of the Board of Governors
example[2]: Parliament gave its assent to war.
definition[1]: to agree to a suggestion, idea etc after considering it carefully
example[3]: They assented to his request to work from home.
example[4]: Any such decision would require the assent of two thirds of shareholders.
definition[3]: a document that legally makes someone the new owner of a dead personâ€™s property
